def_cn: 下流的;有伤风化的;猥亵的
def_en: If you describe something as indecent, you mean that it is shocking and offensive, usually because it relates to sex or nakedness.

def_cn: (速度或数量)不合常规的，离谱的
def_en: If you describe the speed or amount of something as indecent, you are indicating, often in a humorous way, that it is much quicker or larger than is usual or desirable.
